name: Brain Dogs and the Long Cat
name_original: Brain Dogs and the Long Cat
description:
Made by George Brown and Constance Graham for the 48 hour Global Games Jam:
https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/brain-dogs-and-long-cat-3
Repair your broken sanity! After dicing your brain into pieces and splicing the pieces into your pet dogs, you must venture through your house to find them all and put your mind back together. However, a fearsome beast haunts your abode, not just half-brained fantasy, but a real, long, beast.
